categories.tagline: Fuel recovery and strength with clean protein.
Calm the mind and support restful sleep.

items.question: Are wellness supplements safe to use?
items.answer: Our supplements are formulated with quality ingredients and third-party testing where available. Always review the label and consult your healthcare provider before starting a new regimen.

items.question: How should I store my supplements?
items.answer: Keep your bottles in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight and moisture. Avoid storing them in humid bathrooms or hot cars.

items.question: Do you offer international shipping?
items.answer: We currently ship within the US. We’re exploring options for expanded international delivery—sign up for updates to be notified.

items.question: What is your return policy?
items.answer: If you’re not satisfied, contact us within 30 days of delivery. Unopened items can be returned for a refund; opened items may qualify for store credit.

contact.subhead: Questions about products, ingredients, or your order? Reach out and our team will respond quickly.
We’re committed to fast answers on wellness guidance, ingredients, shipping, and wholesale inquiries.

about.title: We believe better health begins with clarity, quality, and science-led simplicity.

panels.title: Supplements made to support real life
panels.body: At Purvanti, we curate clean, effective supplements that support energy, balance, digestion, sleep, and daily vitality. Every product is selected for its quality, scientific backing, and ability to make a meaningful difference in the way you feel—day after day.

panels.title: Where modern research meets natural wellness
panels.body: We partner with trusted brands that prioritize purity, transparency, and evidence-based formulations. Our goal is simple: to bring you wellness solutions that fit seamlessly into everyday routines while supporting long-term health and well-being.

about.quote: We focus on products that are clean, effective, and backed by modern nutritional science.

about.title: Wellness that meets you where you are
about.body: Purvanti blends modern nutritional science with nature’s most reliable ingredients to help you feel grounded, energized, and supported every day. We’re here to simplify your wellness journey—one thoughtfully chosen formula at a time.

hero.subhead: A curated retail platform for science-led wellness companies.

science.title: The Science Behind Our Partnerships
science.subtitle: Standards that protect your brand and elevate every product we represent.

items.title: Evidence-Aligned Curation
items.body: We partner with brands whose formulations are backed by clear science and transparent ingredient standards.

items.title: Rigorous Quality Expectations
items.body: We look for strong manufacturing practices, third-party testing, and consistency in product quality.

items.title: Thoughtful Product Evaluation
items.body: Each product is reviewed for potency, effectiveness, and its real-world wellness impact.

items.title: Purity & Safety Focus
items.body: We value partners committed to high safety standards, including testing for contaminants and ensuring product purity.

faqs.pre_header: What we look for in brands
faqs.title: Partnering with Purvanti

items.question: Clean, transparent ingredient profiles
items.answer: We prioritize formulations with clear labeling, minimal additives, and ingredient sourcing you’re proud to show customers.

items.question: Strong formulation rationale or clinical research
items.answer: We look for evidence-backed formulations—whether clinical studies, published data, or a well-documented rationale for each active.

items.question: Trusted manufacturing and quality controls
items.answer: Consistent QA, reliable manufacturing partners, and robust testing give us confidence to present your products to discerning shoppers.

items.question: Clear consumer benefits and brand story
items.answer: We highlight products that communicate tangible benefits and a brand story customers can understand and trust.

items.question: Responsible pricing and channel alignment
items.answer: We align with brands that respect thoughtful pricing and channel strategies so customers enjoy a consistent premium experience.

brand_statement.title: A shared mission
brand_statement.body: We aim to build lasting relationships with brands that are committed to improving everyday health. Purvanti exists to thoughtfully connect customers with products that truly support their well-being—starting with the brands we choose to represent.

brands.subhead: A curated retail destination for companies committed to science, quality, and modern wellness.

brands.title: The Science Behind Our Partnerships
brands.subtitle: Clear standards that protect your brand and elevate every customer experience.

items.title: Evidence-Led Product Selection
items.body: We partner with brands whose formulations demonstrate scientific rationale and ingredient transparency.

items.title: Quality You Can Trust
items.body: Strong manufacturing practices, validated testing, and consistent QA are essential to our retail standards.

items.title: Thoughtful, Real-World Evaluation
items.body: Every product is reviewed for potency, effectiveness, and its ability to support meaningful, everyday wellness outcomes.

items.title: Safety & Purity First
items.body: We align with partners who uphold rigorous safety expectations, including contaminant and purity testing.

brands.pre_header: What We Look For in Brands
brands.title: Partnering With Purvanti

items.question: Clean, transparent ingredient profiles
items.answer: Formulations should reflect clear labeling, purposeful ingredients, and sourcing practices that build consumer confidence.

items.question: Strong formulation rationale or clinical research
items.answer: We value products supported by clinical data, published research, or a well-defined scientific reasoning for each active component.

items.question: Trusted manufacturing and quality controls
items.answer: Consistency matters. We seek brands with reliable facilities, robust testing, and documented quality assurance standards.

items.question: Clear consumer benefits and brand story
items.answer: Successful partnerships begin with products that communicate tangible benefits and a brand identity customers can connect with.

items.question: Responsible pricing and channel alignment
items.answer: A cohesive pricing strategy across retail channels ensures customers experience your brand as intended—premium, consistent, and trustworthy.

brands.title: A Shared Mission
brands.body: We build long-term relationships with brands committed to elevating everyday health. At Purvanti, our role is to guide customers toward products that truly support their well-being—starting with the partners we thoughtfully select.

home.header: Essential nutrients for energy, balance, and every day wellness

slides.headline: Find calm, restore balance, and unwind naturally

home.title: Performance formulas for strength and stamina
Wellness designed to help you thrive
home.body: We bring together clean, science-backed supplements from trusted brands to support real, lasting well-being. From foundational nutrients to performance essentials, every product is selected to help you feel your best—naturally and consistently.

home.header: Sustainable wellness for you and the planet
